channel.title: Apple on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Apple on mattischrome

item.title: M1 External Monitor Issues
item.description: Since moving to an M1 Mac, I’ve noticed some issues with my second screen that I do not experience with my previous Intel Mac or with my current work laptop, which is a Dell Intel PC running Windows 10.

item.title: A pox on both their houses
item.description: How hard is it to just listen to music these days?
